data.title: Angel Blue with the Princeton Symphony Orchestra
data.meta_description: The 2024 Princeton Festival opens with an operatic extravaganza! Superstar soprano Angel Blue, fresh off a season of performances in major houses both at home and abroad, joins the Princeton Symphony Orchestra for a program of favorite arias.
data.text:
The 2024 Princeton Festival opens with an operatic extravaganza! Superstar soprano Angel Blue, fresh off a season of performances in major houses both at home and abroad, joins the Princeton Symphony Orchestra for a program of favorite arias.

"Blue’s rich power was impressive throughout, cutting through even the thickest of orchestral textures without any hint of strain, as well as impressively controlling pianissimo moments at the top of her range."

– Bachtrack

This performance is made possible in part through the generosity of lead concert sponsors Micaela de Lignerolles and Jay Vawter, with additional support from Len and Laura Berlik, and gifts from Stephanie and Robert Wedeking, and Kerry Perretta.

Friday-Saturday, Opening Weekend, two beautiful new vehicles will be on display at the entrance to the Princeton Festival at Morven Museum & Garden courtesy of Land Rover Princeton.
